Introduction

Yoon Dowoon is a South Korean musician under JYP Entertainment, best known as the drummer and youngest member of the rock band DAY6. He was the last member to join the group in 2015, leading to the band’s rebranding from 5LIVE to DAY6.

Dowoon debuted with DAY6 on September 7, 2015, with the EP "The Day" and the lead single "Congratulations." While primarily a drummer, he has also contributed vocals to some of the band's songs.

On September 27, 2021, he made his solo debut as a singer with the digital single "Out of the Blue." He enlisted for his mandatory military service on January 17, 2022, serving in the military band before being discharged on July 16, 2023.
